Exceeds: Code meets all specified requirements and runs without errors.
Meets: Code meets most requirements but has minor issues or bugs.
Below: Code meets some requirements but contains significant bugs.

Exceeds: Code is highly efficient, with optimal time and space complexity.
Meets: Code is mostly efficient, with some minor inefficiencies.
Below: Code has noticeable inefficiencies but still functions adequately.

Exceeds: Thorough documentation and comprehensive testing included.
